line.originaltext: 3 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
1/4 cup crushed saltine crackers
1/4 cup chopped celery
1 tablespoon diced pimientos
1/2 cup mayonnaise
2 tablespoons milk
1/8 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon garlic salt
1/8 teaspoon pepper
2 English muffins, split and toasted
